title: The Guide Is Fixing His Regrets - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Psychological   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Doting Love Interests   Hunters   Kind Love Interests   Older Love Interests   Past Plays a Big Role   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Weak Protagonist
author: 르뮈
description:
So-Won made up his mind.

I’ll treat him not as a monster but as a human being.

So-Won became an A-class guide. However, the Esper matched with him was “Monster” Kang Tae-Woo, who could not record a matching rate of more than 5% with any guide. 

Due to the lack of guiding, So-Won is unable to approach or guide Tae-woo properly for 8 years, and Tae-woo, who participates in the gate in that state, eventually dies from a serious injury.

So-Won, who lost his mind due to belated guilt and regret, returns to eight years ago and opens his eyes. In order not to lose Tae-Woo like before his regression, So-Won first asks for a match with Tae-Woo….>
